Key Match Events: The Chicago White Sox scored seven runs in the fifth inning, their best inning of the entire season, to cap off a sweep of the Los Angeles Angels.
Post-Match Reflections: Interim manager Grady Sizemore emphasized the importance of playing small ball, playing fundamentally sound, not making mistakes, and taking advantage of opportunities.
Sizemore mentioned the key to success would be putting it together more consistently, day in and day out.
Sizemore has worn the same black pullover every day since Tuesday, when the team's winning streak began.
